OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD AND HALLAMSHIRE COUNTY FOOTBALL ASSOCIATION LIMITED

Desc.entry: Local governing body for football in South Yorkshire. The Association is the first point of contact for all enquiries as they oversee and co-ordinate the 30 leagues and approximately 4,500 teams (male and female) that play in the region. Company limited by guarantee no 04236669.

ContactName.entry: Mr J P Hope-Gill, Chief Executive
